description: Abakobwa n’abahungu bagomba kurindwa ihohoterwa iryo ari ryo ryose noguteshwa agaciro nko gukoreshwa imirimo ivunanye, kutiga, kutagira uburenganzira ku mutungo w’umuryango, gushyingirwa bakiri bato n’ibindi.
title: Abakobwa n’abahungu bagomba kurindwa ihohoterwa iryo ari ryo ryose noguteshwa agaciro nko gukoreshwa imirimo ivunanye, kutiga, kutagira uburenganzira ku mutungo w’umuryango, gushyingirwa bakiri bato n
content: Abakobwa n’abahungu bagomba kurindwa ihohoterwa iryo ari ryo ryose noguteshwa agaciro nko gukoreshwa imirimo ivunanye, kutiga, kutagira uburenganzira ku mutungo w’umuryango, gushyingirwa bakiri bato n’ibindi. Imiryango, ubuyobozi bate inshingano zo gushimangira ubu burenganzira.
